_header: She is gentle and also wise
_description: On the beauty of his mistress — six 3-line stanzas (including refrain, ‘Þat ever I saw’) and burden: ‘My lady is a prety on / A prety prety prety on / My lady is a prety on / As ever I saw’

BLHar7578.First Lines:
She is gentyll & also wysseof all other she berith the
                    price…
BLHar7578.Last Lines:
…Therfor I dare this boldly say[I] shall have the best &
                    farest may þat ever I saw
BLHar7578.Editions:
